description:
At Mast Law Firm, we have a tradition of excellence dating back to our founding in Smithfield in 1962. Today, more than 50 years later, our team of eight experienced attorneys, headed by our founder, George B. Mast, work to continue to provide high-quality legal services to the residents of Johnston and Wake counties and the surrounding areas in eastern North Carolina who have legal needs related to the following:

  • Personal injury
  • Family law
  • Traffic tickets
  • Estate planning

After five decades of legal practice, our firm has built a reputation as one of the leading firms in the region. This reputation is the result of our attorneys' determination to provide our clients with individually tailored legal services delivered with efficiency and honesty.

Whether you sustained an injury in an accident, face a delicate family law challenge, have concerns about losing your driving privileges or need a guide to help you protect your assets for future generations, look no further than Mast Law Firm. If you would like to learn more about the range of services we offer and how we can help you, you can do so by taking advantage of our offer for a free initial consultation on injury matters, at our law office in Smithfield.
